posts.post_content:
Hi - I have the following SGC-graded T206's for sale – let me know any questions. Let me know if you want a bigger scan - PM your email and I can send right along.

I accept PayPal (F/F preferred) or other methods – add $3 shipping for any size order. Thanks! Scott  (Clymer and Conroy from the scans are no longer available - sorry)

Campbell (SC) SGC 30 - $sold
Grimshaw (PB) SGC 30 - $30
Magee Bat (PB) SGC 30 - $30
Smith Chi / Bos (SC 460 overprint 42) SGC 10 - $80
Rhoades (SC) SGC 30 - $sold
Maloney (Pied) SGC 40 - $40
